Snow White is in my opinion a bad movie on an artistic point of view. The plot is pretty much foreseeable, the characters are stereotypes, the editing too. The movie is pale by comparison to My Life, my music, your favorite and A date with Love. I recommend you to watch those movies for films with an original script, good music and a great message of acceptance.

Michael Dudikoff stars as Joe Armstrong a martial artist who fights ninjas who are stealing weapons from the U.S Army, in this entertaining yet admittedly brainless comedic action film. This film is clearly a throwback to the 80's Ninja era ; It's actually the first of a small Ninja and love themed franchise consisting of four films, and three television related products with the same characters but with a slightly different actor starring, this being the love of the genre after all
